AI Description: ltrpred is a tool for predicting the transcription start sites (TSSs) and the directionality of a given genomic sequence, using machine learning models trained on data sets containing experimentally verified TSSs.
Core Features:
1. Predicting transcription start sites in genomic sequences.
2. Determining the directionality of transcription in a given sequence.
3. Utilizing machine learning models for accurate predictions based on experimental data sets.
General Tags: Transcription Start Site Prediction, Genomic Sequences, Machine Learning
